Citing¶

  • Reference Key for ChIMES Methods

Reference Key for Methods/Applications¶

Key definitions are given below.

Method Reference Key
2+3-body ChIMES
  1. Carbon-1
ChIMES+DFTB
  1. PuH-DFTB
  2. DNTF-DFTB
  3. TiH-DFTB
Iterative Refinement
  1. CO-1
Carbon Condensation
  1. CO-1
2+3+4-body ChIMES
  1. CO-2
Distributed LASSO
  1. CO-2
Active Learning
  1. CO-2
ChIMES+MSST
  1. HN-1
  2. DNTF-DFTB

Reference Key for Parameter Sets¶

Parameter set and key name are interchangeable. Key definitions are given below.

KEY Material Bodiedness T (K)/ \(\rho\) (gcc) Range Comments
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2 5000/2.43 N/A
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2 5000/2.43 N/A
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2+3 5000/2.43 N/A
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2+3 6000/2.25-3.00 N/A
Water-1 Water 2+3 298/1.00 N/A
PuH-DFTB Pu/H 2+3 0-300/? DFTB \(E_{\mathrm{rep}}\)
CO-1 Carbon Monoxide (1:1) 2+3 6500-9350/2.5 N/A
CO-2 Carbon Monoxide (1:1) 2+3+4 2400/1.79 N/A
HN-1 Hydrazoic Acid H/N 2+3+4 300-4500/1-2 N/A
DNTF-DFTB 3,4-bis(4-nitrofurazan-3-yl)furoxan 2+3 300-9000/1.86-3.4 DFTB \(E_{\mathrm{rep}}\), Not applicable to other atom type ratios
TiH-DFTB Ti/H 2+3 ?/5.5 DFTB \(E_{\mathrm{rep}}\)

Reference Key Definitions¶

Corresponding authors are indicated with an asterisk (*).

Key Link Definition
Carbon-1 (link) R.K. Lindsey*, L.E. Fried, N. Goldman, J. Chem. Theory Comput., 13 6222 (2017).
PuH-DFTB (link)
  1. Goldman*, B. Aradi, R.K. Lindsey, L.E. Fried, J. Chem. Theory Comput. 14 2652 (2018).
Water-1 (link) R.K. Lindsey*, L.E. Fried, N. Goldman, J. Chem. Theory Comput. 15 436 (2019).
CO-1 (link) R.K. Lindsey*, N. Goldman, L.E. Fried, S. Bastea, J. Chem. Phys. 153 054103 (2020).
CO-2 (link) R.K. Lindsey*, L.E. Fried, N. Goldman, S. Bastea, J. Chem. Phys. 153 134117 (2020).
COND-1 (link) M.R. Armstrong*, R.K. Lindsey*, N. Goldman, M.H. Nielsen, E. Stavrou, L.E. Fried, J.M. Zaug, S. Bastea*, Nat, Commun. 11 353 (2020).
HN-1 (link)
  1. Pham*, R.K. Lindsey, L.E. Fried, N. Goldman, J. Chem. Phys. 153 224102 (2020).
DNTF-DFTB (link) R.K. Lindsey*, S. Bastea*, N. Goldman, L. Fried, In Prep.
TiH-DFTB (link)
  1. Goldman*, K. Kweon, R. K. Lindsey, L. E. Fried, T. W. Heo, B, Sadigh, P. Soderlind, A. Landa, A. Perron, J. Jeffries, In Prep.
